sentences.english: An intense young interpreter accompanied him.
sentences.chinese: 一名熱情的年輕譯員陪伴着他。

sentences.english: They do not provide word-for-word or literal interpretation, nor do you want them to do so.
sentences.chinese: 一名口譯員曾對我講過他被要求口譯證詞的事。

sentences.english: Our interpreter will translate throughout the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 會議中我們的翻譯員會全程翻譯。

sentences.english: One interpreter handles American sign language.
sentences.chinese: 一個口譯員負責處理美國手語。

sentences.english: An interpreter and guide in the near east.
Eventually, an interpreter got our request across and we made the journey.
sentences.chinese: 最終，譯員傳達了我們的要求，我們得以上路了。

sentences.english: NO computer or any devices alike could replace interpretor.
sentences.chinese: 口譯員是任何電腦或翻譯設備所無法替代的。

sentences.english: Have you ever thought of being an interpreter someday?
sentences.chinese: 你有想過有一天做口譯員嗎？

sentences.english: Have a gift for languages, want to become an interpreter.
sentences.chinese: 有語言天賦，想成爲一名口譯員。

sentences.english: We do not know why the translator made that mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道那名翻譯員爲何會犯下這個錯誤。

sentences.english: I think so; I used to be an interpreter.
sentences.chinese: 我想可以的，我以前做過翻譯員。

sentences.english: The documents must he translated in Libya through u legal translator.
sentences.chinese: 文件必須經過法律翻譯員翻譯成利比亞語。

sentences.english: Even professionals have to work in tandem with another simultaneous interpreter.
sentences.chinese: 就算是專業人士也要和另一名同聲傳譯員進行合作。
或許這就是一個譯員的命。

sentences.english: It is why even bilingual doctors rely on interpreters.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼就連雙語的醫生也要依賴於口譯員。

sentences.english: Her work as a simultaneous translator requires strong powers of concentration.
sentences.chinese: 作爲同步翻譯員，她的工作需要極大的專注力。

definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
student who also works part-time/(old) reform-school student

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
